short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays all meta data and main SEO information for the best SEO

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO META in 1 CLICK (V3) is a tool designed to clearly display all meta tags/data and essential SEO information. Using this tool, you can more effectively manage and enhance your SEO and online visibility.

This extension has been updated to support Manifest V3, ensuring compatibility with the latest browser extension standards.

Our tool focuses on showing:
✔ Title and its length,
✔ Description and its length,
✔ URL (including meta-canonical URL),
✔ Meta-robots,
✔ Headers in the order they appear in HTML (H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, and H6),
✔ Number of images with and without ALT attributes,
✔ Number of links (internal, unique, etc.),
✔ Open Graph and Twitter social data,
✔ Robots.txt and sitemap.xml,
✔ And much more...
(See screenshots)
